panels.description: The total number of blocks in the ledger 20 seconds ago, minus the current number of blocks in the index. If this value is >0, it means the index has had 20s to process all the blocks but has not managed - it may be stuck.

targets.expr: sum by (value, token) (cycles_ledger_number_of_blocks offset 20s) - sum by (value, token)(index_number_of_blocks{ic="mercury",token="tcycles"})

panels.title: Ledger 20s ago vs Index
